Check your classpath: you have to add junit-4.1.jar too your classpath
(ass=
uming you use JUnit 4.1). The message indicates, that
org.junit.runner.JUni=
tCore has not been found.

And make sure, that your classes (TestX) are als=
o available at classpath.

HTH, Jochen
